Text: Can anyone confirm this is an English version without hard coded subtitles?  I can see that it is RAR'd and that means (1) fee for password to open and/or (2) fake.

It's the real thing. Great quality and the subtitles are all optional. If you have that strict a no rar policy you're going to miss out on a lot of good stuff. I would rather buy this movie before I was caught complaining on forums on how it was brought to me for free. ;-)
